sentences.en: After a quietus of twenty years she returned.
sentences.cn: 她隐退二十年后又东山再起.

sentences.en: The plan has finally got its quietus, ie been abandoned.
sentences.cn: 这一计画终于胎死腹中(遭放弃).

sentences.en: The police gave the villain his quietus.
sentences.cn: 警察结果了那坏蛋的性命.

words.tran_cn: 解除；[金融]偿清；生命的终止；寂灭
